citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:05pm on
Tuesday, April 22, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensees but upon arriving at the facility, was informed
by a family member that the licensees were not present and would not be available for several hours. Failure to provide
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to
comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:05pm on 
Tuesday, April 22, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensees but upon arriving at the facility, was informed 
by a family member that the licensees were not present and would not be available for several hours. Failure to provide 
access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to 
comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
